txt.en: 'Then the scouts reports were accurate? This will make our task much easier.'
'Welcome back, [placeholder]. So the scout-reports were accurate? Then our task will be much simpler, I am sure.'
In the Wake of the Golden Host

You have discovered an enemy patrol

The road to the Gostannon lies to the north of Amon Angened, leading eastwards. The first patrol point lies to the north-west of Amon Angened, upon the road.\n\nDannaswen has asked you to patrol the road to the Gostannon in order to determine the strength of the Enemy there.
'The road to the Gostannon lies to the north of here, [placeholder]...when you have finished your patrol, return to me.'

Dannaswen is at the Elf-waypost atop Amon Angened, south of the Gostannon.\n\nYou should report back to Dannaswen at once.

Talk to Dannaswen atop Amon Angened
The Elves of the Golden Host are concerned with the continued presence of Orcs in the Mirk-eaves and in procuring supplies for the Malledhrim in the east.

'As you know, Falasgon sent word of another Orc-encampment near the Gostannon to the north. From what the scouts reported, the presence of the Enemy has been nearly wiped out at that camp, but we must be certain before devoting resources to destroy it.

'I would ask you a favour, [placeholder]: patrol the lands to the north, especially along the road leading to the Gostannon, to determine the strength of the foe.

'When you have completed your patrol, return here.'
